• I would like to automate how i create new blog posts because i will be making posts easier. A blog feels very necessary for me but its not something am really in love with. When i go to the web interface i should be able to create a new post and have it show in the blog as a new post and persisted for future use. First when i create a new post i should upload to azure the post in a blog storage container. We will also use the same container is used to extract drafts. When we publish the post we are going to upload to azure and then push changes to a gitbucket repo which will trigger a circle-cli job to rebuild the site and then push changes to github repository.
